eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.file

Class LocalFileStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.file.LocalFileStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileStatus

    public class LocalFileStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileStatus
    The class LocalFileStatus provides an implementation of the FileStatus interface for the local file system.
    Author:
    warneke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalFileStatus(java.io.File f, FileSystem fs)
      Creates a LocalFileStatus object from a given File object.
